name: Disco Vampire - Ludum Dare 37
description:
This game was made for the 37th Ludum Dare Jam in less than 72h.

A vampire stuck on a disco dancefloor, blazing spotlights incomiiing !

- Use 'V' key to dash through the lights

- Use the space bar to teleport to the other side

@I208iN - Illustrations / Programming

@Glugludor - Sound Design / Level Design

@MixBulfreak - Programming / Level Design
